description: This file defines an interface IMessageService within the namespace FrndAppBackend.Services. It declares asynchronous methods for sending messages and retrieving conversations related to messaging functionality in the application.

classes.name: IMessageService
classes.description: Interface specifying messaging operations, including sending a message and retrieving conversation history.

methods.name: SendAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a message from a user identified by fromUserId, with message details provided in SendMessageRequest.

methods.name: GetConversationAsync
methods.description: Asynchronously retrieves a list of messages between the user identified by me and other user, with options for pagination.
